sentences.en: A large enemy force is bearing down upon the border.
sentences.cn: 大军压境.

sentences.en: A sightseeing tour of the city is included to help you get your bearings.
sentences.cn: 城市观光游包括在内，以帮助你们弄清方向。

sentences.en: An aquifer is a water - bearing rock stratum such as sandstone and chalk.
sentences.cn: 地下蓄水层是一些有水的岩石层,如沙岩和白垩岩.

sentences.en: An oil seal was replaced, along with both front wheel bearings.
sentences.cn: 换了一个油封和两个前轮轴承

sentences.en: Exercise has a direct bearing on how healthy you are.
sentences.cn: 锻炼直接影响你的身体状况。

sentences.en: Experts generally agree that diet has an important bearing on your general health.
sentences.cn: 专家们普遍认为饮食和健康总体状况密切相关。

sentences.en: He preserved his grave and dignified bearing.
sentences.cn: 他保持庄重威严的仪态.

sentences.en: How's Mary bearing up?
sentences.cn: 玛丽现在怎么样？

sentences.en: I fail to see the bearing of that remark.
sentences.cn: 我不明白那句话的真意何在.

sentences.en: learning to take a compass bearing
sentences.cn: 学习用罗盘辨别方向

sentences.en: Lionesses bearing cubs in the zoo is nothing new now.
sentences.cn: 狮子在动物园繁殖早已屡见不鲜了.

sentences.en: My orchard is bearing well this year.
sentences.cn: 今年我的果园果实累累.

sentences.en: One's bearing is respectable.
sentences.cn: 品貌端庄.

sentences.en: She later wrote warmly of his bearing and behaviour.
sentences.cn: 稍后她热情地写到了他的风度与举止。

sentences.en: The journal rubs against the bearing surface.
sentences.cn: 轴颈在轴承面上摩擦.

sentences.en: The oil - bearing structure of the new oil field has been verified.
sentences.cn: 新油田的含油层结构已经探明.

sentences.en: The old veteran had a martial bearing.
sentences.cn: 那老兵具有威武的仪表.

sentences.en: The roof support structure had collapsed and the entire weight was bearing down on the ceiling.
sentences.cn: 屋顶的支架倒塌了，全部重量都压到了天花板上。

sentences.en: This is a manuscript bearing as a title Ruth.
sentences.cn: 这是一篇题为《鲁思》的手稿.

sentences.en: Young people are bearing the brunt of unemployment.
sentences.cn: 年轻人首当其冲，面临失业压力。

words.tran_cn: 持票人；[建] 承木；[机] 托架；送信人；搬运工人

phrases.tran_cn: 承载量；结果能力；产仔能力
承载结构，承重结构；支承结构；推力轴承结构
含气的；气体轴承；含瓦斯的
极限承载力，极限承载量；轴承极限能力，承载量

trans.tran_cn: 关系，影响，举止，方位，轴承
trans.tran_en: the way in which you move, stand, or behave, especially when this shows your character
